data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Batdâmbâng, Cambodia a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Batdâmbâng, Cambodia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,036,500 people living in Batdâmbâng, Cambodia. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.section_summary: On average, 69 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Batdâmbâng, Cambodia.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Batdâmbâng, Cambodia.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Father, help the 21,199 believers in Batdâmbâng to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,015,301 lost friends and neighbors.
Father, I pray that the Chong people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Chong people know you.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Batdâmbâng, Cambodia and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Batdâmbâng, Cambodia, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Batdâmbâng, Cambodia humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

location.name: Batdâmbâng
location.cities_list: Battambang, Bo Rai, Ta Loas, Koas Krala, Bavel
location.cities_list_w_pop: Battambang (150,444), Bo Rai (13,620), Ta Loas, Koas Krala, Bavel
